PrecisReappointment of WILTON LITTLECHILD of Maskwacis, Alberta, as half-time Commissioner of the Indian Residential Schools Truth and Reconciliation Commission, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending December 31, 2015, effective July 1, 2015.
